item.celestisynth.solaris.desc_0: - Right-click to perform a graceful spin, inflicting damage and burning nearby entities.
item.celestisynth.solaris.desc_1: - Right-click while holding SHIFT to dash forward, striking and temporarily igniting entities in your path.
item.celestisynth.crescentia.desc_0: - Right-click to unleash a dazzling barrage of strikes on nearby entities, accompanied by a mesmerizing firework display.
item.celestisynth.crescentia.desc_1: - Right-click while holding SHIFT to unleash a ranged barrage of slashes, cutting through any entity in its path.
